definition: Huang Binhong (1865-1955), art historian and literati painter

sentences.english: An exhibition of the works of Huang Binhong is held in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 黄宾虹作品观摩会在上海开幕。

sentences.english: This is entirely a work of art, people suspected from Huang Binhong hand.
sentences.chinese: 这完全是一件艺术品，让人怀疑出自黄宾虹之手。

definition: Shi Tao (1642-1707), Chinese landscape painter and poet
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
Xu Beihong (1895-1953), famous European trained painter and influential art teacher
Wen Zhengming (1470-1559), Ming painter, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
Wen Zhengming (1470-1559), Ming painter, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
Mi Fu (1051-1107), Song poet and calligrapher
